text: It is the night, dark as the killers' mask. A shrill cry of terror is heard, then, a shot that silences him. No window has been opened; we are all trembling inside, avoiding being witnesses to a fact that might later engulf us. A car runs away and is lost with its load of death. At the corner someone is writhing in a great pool of blood. A slumbering gang of criminals is trying to sabotage the dream. FIN
title: La noche
author: Manuel Rueda
